name: Jaggery powder

benefits.title: Rich in Minerals
benefits.description: Contains essential minerals like iron, potassium, magnesium, and phosphorus.

benefits.title: Natural Sweetener
benefits.description: Healthier alternative with lower glycemic index, potentially causing less blood sugar spike.

benefits.title: Digestive Aid
benefits.description: May help stimulate digestive enzymes, promoting smoother digestion.

benefits.title: Detoxification
benefits.description: Believed to help cleanse the liver and remove toxins from the body.

benefits.title: Energy Boost
benefits.description: Contributes to increased energy levels with minerals and B vitamins.

benefits.title: Potential Immunity Booster
benefits.description: Presence of antioxidants and minerals like zinc and selenium might contribute to a stronger immune system.

benefits.title: Skin Health
benefits.description: Antioxidants may improve skin health by combating free radicals.

description: Jaggery powder is sunshine on your tongue! Made from pure sugarcane juice, it's a natural sweetener with a rich, caramel depth that goes beyond ordinary sugar. Imagine the warmth of molasses with a hint of earthiness, all in a convenient, easy-to-use powder. Not only does it tantalize your taste buds, but it boasts minerals and antioxidants, making it a guilt-free indulgence for your next culinary creation.

name: Dry red chilly

specification.Packing: Typically comes in 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 & 40 kg cartons, jute bags or polypropylene (PP) bags, or as per customer requirement.

benefits.title: Rich in Vitamins
benefits.description: Contains vitamins C and A, and potassium.

benefits.title: Metabolism Boost
benefits.description: May boost metabolism and increase feelings of fullness.

variety.title: Cayenne peppers
variety.description: These are typically long and slender, with a deep red color. They are known for their intense heat.

variety.title: Ancho peppers
variety.description: These are large, wide peppers that are dried to a deep mahogany color. They have a smoky flavor and mild to moderate heat.

variety.title: Guajillo peppers
variety.description: These are long and narrow peppers with a deep red color. They have a fruity flavor and mild to moderate heat.

description: Dried red chilies are a vibrant red spice made from ripening and drying chili peppers of various species. They come in a variety of shapes and sizes, depending on the variety of chili pepper used.

name: Wheat flour
description: Wheat flour is a versatile ingredient used in various culinary applications, offering a range of textures and flavors depending on extraction levels. It's a staple in many cuisines worldwide.

name: Milk powder

specification.Packaging: Multi-layer bags, drums, or as specified

benefits.title: Nutrient Fortification
benefits.description: Can be fortified with vitamins and minerals, improving nutrient intake.

benefits.title: Increased Shelf Life
benefits.description: Encourages milk consumption where access to fresh milk is limited, providing essential nutrients like calcium.

description: Milk powder is made by removing most of the water content from liquid milk through a drying process. It offers a long shelf life and versatility in various culinary and nutritional applications.

name: Tomato Paste

benefits.title: Antioxidant
benefits.description: Rich in lycopene, an antioxidant linked to heart and some cancer benefits.

benefits.title: Vitamins
benefits.description: Concentrated source of vitamins A, C, and K.

benefits.title: Flavor
benefits.description: Boosts flavor and color in dishes without extra calories or fat.

description: Tomato paste is the burst of summer in a jar! Crafted from ripe tomatoes, it's a versatile flavor enhancer with a concentrated tanginess that elevates any dish. Picture the vibrant essence of sun-ripened tomatoes with a touch of sweetness, all in a convenient, kitchen-friendly paste. Rich in lycopene and nutrients, it's a wholesome addition to your culinary repertoire.
